name: Who's too old ? - Team 8
description: Bernardo, a former Italian mafia godfather now in a retirement home, is bored stiff and wants to get back to work.  All he has to do is escape. The nurses don't close the door during their break, it's time!  Armed with his wheelchair and his rheumatism pills, he leaves. In a bad mood, he goes to strip the other residents in order to facilitate his escape.  Controls TEAM  Julien Dor : Game Programmer Imane Taruf : Game Programmer Corentin Lelong : Game Programmer Chloé Morin : Game Designer Nathan Renaud : Game Designer Grégoire Vottero : Game Designer Anass Rami : Game Artist Jason Hameon : Game Artist Nicolas Blois : Producers
